parameters.name: AutoTraceEnabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable lineage-based automatic backtracking.

parameters.name: DataAssetType
parameters.description:
The type of the data asset. Valid values:

*   ACS::DataWorks::Table
*   ACS::DataWorks::Task

parameters.name: EnvType
parameters.description:
The environment of the workspace to which the data asset belongs. Valid values:

*   Dev: development environment
*   Prod: production environment

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to data assets.
